title: Come find your new home at Aria! Great amenities and views!
posting_body: Use this link for more info:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 691 Sq.
At Aria apartments you can linger in bed a little while longer.
Imagine a short commute to nearby places like Nintendo and Microsoft (to name a few).
Have a quick stroll at Anderson Park across the street to walk your pup.
Spend the afternoon wine tasting in Woodinville Wine Country where you can drink in valley views and sample from over 100 different wineries.
Later you can dance in evening air during a Marymoor concert or sample a seasonal flavor at Molly Moon’s (or go with steadfast classic salted caramel, it’s always there for you).
Maybe tomorrow you’ll sink into your usual seat at Tian Tian or relax with a nice glass of red on the roof while taking in Mt. Rainier views.
This is the attraction of Aria.
It’s stylish clean design and exceptional service in the heart of Redmond at the ready to add luxury into the every day moments of life.
Offering modern one and two bedroom apartments and lofts with an impressive list of amenities to enhance your day-to-day living.
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
